title: XHR Replay
body:
This feature allows users to replay previosly made XHR requests.

Proposed Design
- Provide a replay button to enter "Edit request mode"
- Provide a context menu option on captured XHR requests to enter "Edit request mode"
- Provide a "Edit request mode" where users can modify and re-send previously made XHR requests
